duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the communication between sales representatives and customers.
Maintain a professional rapport with the team and customers.
Follow up on leads within territory including existing relationships and prospect opportunities.
Support Hubspot related projects and campaigns.
Support Sales staff through calls and scheduled meetings.
Email company content to prospects and clients.
Run reports and maintain records in Hubspot.
Assist Sales Staff with updating/refreshing Service and Support renewal contracts.
Develop knowledge of all products and service sold by the company.
Document all sales activity in HubSpot database.
Research leads as additional information as needed.
Enter conference leads and Trip Reports from Sales staff into HubSpot.
Collect, Organize and Maintain RFI's RFP's, RFQ's and Cert. & Reps forms.
Ensure that all procedures are completed and that quality standards are met.
Suggest changes that may enhance or improve both the working practices and the quality of products and services.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, marketing, or a similar major is preferred, but not required.
